caption.title: Presence of plasmid operons, AMR genes (Resfinder) and virulence genes (VFDB) determined by in-silico genotyping using ARIBA software.
caption.p: The identifier column corresponds to the study-identifier column in S1 Table. Presence of genes are indicated by ‘1’. Table can be viewed at https://www.dropbox.com/sh/dh84yyc4tguirw3/AABnbbrSPtqEcjGY6IR6GggLa?dl=0.
Click here for additional data file.
